function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Travel contributing to disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of travel restrictions, reduction of flight and route options","Technologies":"Temperature screening, travel advisories, 14-day quarantine","People":"Travellers, general public","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lockdown measures and temperature screening in public places","Impact":"Limiting the spread of coronavirus, managing infectees","Mitigation":"Lockdown measures, temperature screening, isolation of confirmed cases","Technologies":"Infrared thermometers, quarantine measures","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Model-based predictions for mitigation measures","Impact":"Effective decision-making for mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Model-based predictions, data collection, epidemiological analysis, clinical research","Technologies":"Model-based prediction tools, data analysis technologies","People":"Policymakers, public health authorities","Owner":"Health research organizations, government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Herd immunity and vaccine effectiveness in ageing populations","Impact":"Ineffective vaccine strategies for ageing populations","Mitigation":"Reevaluation of infection control strategies, consideration of alternative options","Technologies":"Epidemiological research, alternative treatment options","People":"Ageing populations, public health authorities","Owner":"Health research organizations, government"}]}
